title: Interpretation of dreams: There is no god but You, Glory be to You. I was one of the wrongdoers in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing that there is no god but You, Glory be to You, I was among the wrongdoers in a dream I see phrases that bring a lot of goodness and blessings that the Messenger of God called on Muslims to repeat them so that they receive many rewards from the beautiful dreams that carry great meanings and that indicate that whoever sees them thinks a lot about God and a lot. Let us learn together about me, the interpretation of seeing that there is no god but You, glory be to You, that I was one of the sinners in a dream. Interpretation: I dreamed that I saw that there is no god but You, Glory be to You, I was among the wrongdoers in a dream according to Ibn Sirin's interpretation. The dream interpretation scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says: Whoever sees in a dream that he is supplicating that there is no god but You, Glory be to You, you are among the oppressed and injustice has occurred. In reality. The vision explained to him that God Almighty will lift the sin from him. The dream of repeating the supplication of the states of the letter Nun is a sign of saving the dreamer from the distress he is going through, easing his life, and obtaining abundant sustenance. Whoever sees in his dream that he repeats this request and wishes in reality, this vision for him is good news that he will achieve what he wants soon. If the dreamer is sick and sees this vision in his dream, this means that God Almighty will grant him a speedy recovery. I say there is no god but You, Glory be to You, I was among the wronged in the dream of the debtor and promised him to pay his debts and alleviate his distress. Ibn Sirin says that the man who sees in his dream that he repeats this supplication will receive a promotion and a high position in his work. Repeating the supplication of our master Yunus in a dream indicates that the dreamer will triumph over his enemies and escape from them. Interpretation of dreams to see a dream saying there is no god but You, Glory be to You, I was among the wrongdoers The dream interpreter Fahd Al-Osaimi says that saying there is no god but You, Glory be to You, I was among the wrongdoers in a dream indicates that there are many doors To earn the lawful life that will open up to the dreamer. If we dream that we repeat this request, the dreamer will soon hear news that will bring happiness and joy to his heart. If the dreamer is suffering from problems between him and someone close to him, the vision for him is that these problems will end. And whoever commits a sin and sees in his dream that he is repeating this supplication, this means that he is approaching God Almighty and repenting for what he does. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the supplication of Dhul-Nun in a dream for a single woman One of the promising visions for a single woman who is late in her marriage is her dream of repeating the supplication of Dhul-Nun. That is, God Almighty marries her to a man of morals with whom she sees happiness in her coming life. If the owner of the vision is afraid and anxious about her ordeal and sees in her dream that she is repeating the supplication of Dhul-Nun, then this vision is good news for her that she will succeed and excel in the experiences. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the supplication of Dhul-Nun in a dream for a married woman A married woman dreams that she says There is no god but You, Glory be to You, I was among the wrongdoers, good news for her that her gifts will soon increase and that God will give her peace and stability. Life with her husband. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is repeating the supplication of the Prophet Yunus and her pregnancy is delayed, then her vision indicates that God Almighty will save her soon. And if the dreamer suffers from many problems

title: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand and interpretation of a dream about henna on the right hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a married womanHenna is usually applied to a woman’s hand when there is an auspicious occasion on her way or she decorates her hands with beautiful engravings and decorations with henna as a natural means of adornment instead of using other means that hinder her when washing, but seeing it in a dream carries many risks. Important concepts Which we learn through our topic today. What is the interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand? Henna on the hand in a dream has more than one meaning, depending on the social status of the viewer, whether he is male or female, married or single. All of these details cast a shadow on the dream and make it different. In the interpretation from one person to another. The interpretation of the presence of henna on the hand expresses the goodness and happiness that awaits the fortuneteller if he appears in a better appearance. If it is a married woman who finds henna engraved on the back of her hand and her appearance is stable and elegant, then she is waiting for good news, it may be that Related to a new pregnancy that she wanted for a while or the return of someone close to her who had traveled before for a while and felt lonely in his absence. The harmonious inscription is evidence of the good luck that accompanies the dreamer in all his future affairs. If he is a merchant, he can develop his wealth and increase his wealth through many profitable deals that he undertakes. If the dreamer is a young man and is looking for a wife, but he does not find a girl who has the characteristics he imagines in his life partner, then this dream is good news for him that he will find her soon, at the end of the year. All his problems and worries and his stability in a happy, small family with this good wife. In the case of a student of knowledge who found henna on his hands, and was very exhausting in his studies, excellence will be his share, as a reward for his efforts. Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand by Ibn Sirin. The imam said: Henna is evidence of achieving Desires and the achievement of goals, as long as they appear as an adornment at the hand of the monarch or the fortuneteller. If the dreamer is sick and has exhausted all means and gone to many doctors and almost despairs of recovering from his illness, then God sends him this dream, as a kind of renewed hope, that recovery is inevitable, Even if he slows down for the sake of time, then it is a kind of sadness that raises his condition to God and reduces his sins. He also said that placing it on the fingers is evidence of closeness to God Almighty and a lot of glory and praise, which makes him feel blessed in everything and does not find anything that he hates in his life. what ever. How simple or poor it is. He is rich and finds it in the pleasure of God. Among the defects of the dream is that the dreamer finds that he has applied henna on his left leg or left hand, as it is a sign of walking on the path of disobedience and wrongdoing and being far from the path of guidance. What is the interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of single women. Henna expresses About happiness after the fatigue and torment of an unmarried girl. If she feels oppression and injustice within her family, or is under the control of a stepmother or stepfather, then the end of her sadness is imminent, and God will compensate her for the sadness. And the illusion. If the girl is of marriageable age, her relationship with the right person is close and she will find the happiness she seeks with him. But if

title: Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife naked in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: The vision can indicate reconciliation or the return of the two parties again, and the vision comes in several ways, which are as follows, which we will show from your website gptafser.com/ in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife naked in a dream for a single girl. The dream of nudity in the dream of an unmarried woman remains more than The meaning of good and evil. If an unmarried girl dreams of the nakedness of a man, then she knows him in reality. The vision suggests that the unmarried girl enters into a new cooperative project for a commercial or private project. But if an unmarried girl dreams of the nakedness of a man unknown to her in a dream. The vision shows ways The bad girl and her undesirable actions. Seeing the nudity of a strange man in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of traditional marriage. But if an unmarried girl enters into a relationship with a young man and sees his organs in a dream. The vision indicates that the song is officially linked to reality. Seeing the nudity of a child of an unmarried woman Married in her dream is a sign that she will achieve her dream and reach a good position. Seeing the nakedness of the father or brother in the dream of an unmarried girl. The vision shows that he is facing problems in the family and that they need someone to support them. Seeing strange nakedness indicates one girl. The vision suggests that she will soon marry someone A man she did not know before. But if a girl sees someone’s nakedness in a dream, and she is angry, and she is far from that person. The vision refers to the girl’s good qualities and does not get worse. But if an unmarried girl dreams that she dreams of someone’s organs in a dream. The vision indicates Until the girl makes difficult and wrong decisions in her life. The dream indicates that the married woman will face Problems in marriage in the future. Seeing a stranger committing obscenity on a married woman is evidence that the problem will end soon. A married woman dreams of observing someone’s genitals in a dream and then discovers that he is her husband. The vision is evidence of her good relationship with her husband and her closeness to him. The vision is that he will live a life A long period of happiness, satisfaction and comfort. If he sees a man’s nakedness and looks at him with astonishment and astonishment. The dream interprets the solutions to all her problems, and the pain that she spends in the following days with her husband. If a married woman sees the nakedness of someone close to her in a dream. The vision symbolizes an abundance of food and additional goodness in Her life soon. But if a married woman sees in a dream a man’s private parts and does not know the man. The dream also symbolizes the arrival of joy and good luck into her world. A married woman dreams that she is holding the genitals of a strange man and feels that she knows him in the dream. The vision indicates a trip of a family member to her. And the dreamer is not satisfied with his departure. If she was wearing loose clothes or a veil in her dream, and she met a man and saw his organs. The vision symbolizes the arrival of money, benefits, and prosperity in her life. Interpretation of seeing my ex-wife naked in a dream about a man and its meaning. The man sees in his dream that he is sitting with someone

title: Interpretation of a person I love in a dream Seeing a lover in a dream

preview.html: A dream about someone I love for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, an expensive person, to talk to a lover, to meet a lover, to betray a lover, a vision about my ex-lover in Ibn Shirin and more. The lover in a dream is one of the beautiful and wonderful dreams that we see in dreams and cause We have a great state of happiness and great joy, as the dream has many important meanings and connotations that a person must know and that the dreamer will come, as our loved ones are one of the important people whom we adore in life. They think constantly and collectively, which makes the subconscious think about them. In order to see someone you love in a dream, there are many important interpretations that the dreamer must be fully aware of, which we will examine for you as Ibn Sirin interpreted them in his interpretations, as the interpretation differs. Dreaming from one person to another according to the vision. Interpretation of a lover in a dream. Whoever dreams in a dream that he is in love with a person, whether he sees him or not in his dream, then the dreamer will suffer an experience, misfortune, or sadness that will affect his happiness. Whoever dreams that he is in love with someone of the opposite sex who is not one of his mahrams. That is, a man’s love for a woman, or a girl’s love, or a woman’s duty to a man, this explains it. It is a temptation that prolongs grief as long as he has love and the duration of the dream. Whoever sees that a living person says to him, “I love you” in a dream, the reality of life will be the opposite, which means that this person hates him and he hates him in reality. If you see a lover or a lover in a dream or a dream, This symbolizes acceptance, self-respect, and appreciation for your true worth. This lover in a dream or dream may be someone you secretly love or someone you want to be associated with, and in this case the dream reflects your dissatisfaction with your love life. If the person you saw in the dream or in Dreaming of a former lover, this symbolizes some things that are still pending regarding that particular relationship. And even if you are in a relationship now, you still have not forgotten the old relationship. If you dream that your lover is attractive and beautiful, it means that you will court a woman who will bring you pleasure, pleasure and a good inheritance. If her appearance in the dream is different, it means that you are not satisfied with your choice of partner before marriage Including.If your lover in a dream is sick or troubled, know that the future will bring sad and happy events.If you see that your loved one has died, you will go through a long period of doubt, distrust, and misfortune. Interpretation of a lover in a dream for a man. A man who sees his old girlfriend in a dream shows that he misses To her a lot. A person who sees that his girlfriend is beautiful in a dream indicates that he will meet a beautiful woman in life. A man who sees his girlfriend in a bad dream shows that he is not satisfied with his life partner. A man who sees his girlfriend sick in a dream indicates that his life will be exposed to many problems. Interpretation of a lover in a dream for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman seeing her lover in a dream shows her complete desire to see her old lover. Seeing a pregnant woman in the arms of her ex-boyfriend in a dream is evidence of her betrayal of her husband.

title: Learn about the interpretation of prayer in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I pray in a dreamPrayer is one of the pillars of Islam, and no one can be straight in his life without prayer, so seeing it in a dream carries many connotations and meanings for dreamers, knowing that whoever repeats such dreams immediately searches for what the vision brings, for that day. Through our website, we will discuss in detail the effects of the vision for both men and women, depending on the different social status. Praying in a dreamPraying in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will respond to a long-standing invitation. The dream also symbolizes that the dreamer wants to obey God Almighty, and remember Him while standing and sitting. And doing good deeds that bring him closer to God Almighty. Praying in a dream is a good omen that God’s help is near and that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better and he will get rid of everything that disturbs his life. Seeing prayer in a dream A large number of dream interpreters agreed that the dreamer desires to fulfill trust and loyalty. With all his promises, he is consistent in his principles despite circumstances changing from time to time. As for someone who is suffering from a crisis, seeing prayer in a dream indicates that God Almighty will save the dreamer’s life, but if he is suffering from debts, the dream symbolizes the repayment of all debts, whatever they may be. Its amount. Prayer in a dream is a sign that the dreamer has many good qualities and good qualities. Whoever sees in his dream that he is praying the Sunnah on time, it shows him a pure heart and pure intention, and he has the ability to deal with every problem and crisis that he encounters. This vision also shows that there is no Around the dreamer is a person who does not wish him well, knowing that in general he is a person close to God Almighty and treats the people around him well. Praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Praying in a dream is a sign that the doors of livelihood will open wide for the dreamer and, God Almighty willing, he will find a noticeable improvement in his life and get rid of Which causes him a crisis. Prayer in a dream is also a good omen to receive a lot of good news that will change the dreamer’s life for the better, in addition to a large number of positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Performing the imposed prayer in a dream, Ibn Sirin showed that the dreamer desires to fulfill the trust To its owners, because it fulfills promises and takes into account customs and traditions over time. A prayer rug in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiImam Fahd Al-Osaimi explained that a prayer rug in a dream has more than one meaning and more than one interpretation, and here are the most prominent of these interpretations: A prayer rug in a dream is a sign of good things that will come In the dreamer's life, and in general, his life will be more stable than ever before. Seeing a prayer rug for someone who has abandoned prayer is a warning message to the dreamer to return to his Lord and prepare to perform the obligatory duties. Prostrating on the prayer rug in a dream means getting rid of sins and staying away from desires and everything that angers God Almighty. Rug Prayer in a dream is a good omen that the dreamer will be able to achieve all his goals that he has been trying to achieve for a long time. Prayer in a dream for single peoplePrayer in a dream in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that carry more than one meaning and more than one interpretation, and

Praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Praying in a dream is a sign that the doors of livelihood will open wide for the dreamer and, God Almighty willing, he will find a noticeable improvement in his life and get rid of Which causes him a crisis. Prayer in a dream is also a good omen to receive a lot of good news that will change the dreamer’s life for the better, in addition to a large number of positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Performing the imposed prayer in a dream, Ibn Sirin showed that the dreamer desires to fulfill the trust To its owners, because it fulfills promises and takes into account customs and traditions over time. A prayer rug in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiImam Fahd Al-Osaimi explained that a prayer rug in a dream has more than one meaning and more than one interpretation, and here are the most prominent of these interpretations: A prayer rug in a dream is a sign of good things that will come In the dreamer's life, and in general, his life will be more stable than ever before. Seeing a prayer rug for someone who has abandoned prayer is a warning message to the dreamer to return to his Lord and prepare to perform the obligatory duties. Prostrating on the prayer rug in a dream means getting rid of sins and staying away from desires and everything that angers God Almighty. Rug Prayer in a dream is a good omen that the dreamer will be able to achieve all his goals that he has been trying to achieve for a long time. Prayer in a dream for single peoplePrayer in a dream in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the visions that carry more than one meaning and more than one interpretation, and

title: Interpretation of seeing electricity in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an electricity meter in a dream: It indicates that the dreamer has made many promises to many of those close to him and seeing the cashier of one ticket who always fulfilled the promises he made to himself. It is also a symbol that real life needs a permanent change in its course, a renewal in the way of working or a change in Project.Interpretation of seeing an electric diamond in a dream. It is a prediction of the possibility of the fortuneteller contracting some disease or the approaching of his term. And seeing the man seeing an electric shock indicates the imminent death of that person, especially if he is suffering from some disease. It contains an indication of the psychological pressure of the viewer as a result of what is going on around him. In his real-life machinations, and the obscene words he speaks that cause these pressures. Like an electric short circuit in a dream, it symbolizes the obstacles and crises that will soon meet the pioneer in the next stage of his real life. Dream interpretation of a power outage and darkness is a sign of the upcoming crises that the dreamer’s life faces in real life, which It will cause sadness in his life. It also suggests the extent of isolation and alienation that the viewer feels from his relatives, society, and relatives, and the feeling of fear and pain that this causes in his inability to break free from this isolation in which he lives. Interpretation of the return of electricity in a dream is a sign that the dreamer has achieved all his ambitions and dreams that he Try to achieve them, while achieving excellence in achieving them. It can also be interpreted for the recovery of the patient and the return of the long-absent, and the joy and happiness that exists. Such as the return of electricity in a dream indicates the viewer’s constant desire to change his life for the better and gain a lot of positive energy. It indicates the constant desire to repent after committing sins And the desire for a life full of psychological peace. Freedom from the shackles of self-hatred and following Satan. Interpretation of seeing an electric diamond for a married woman: Because of his intense fear. Electrical short circuits. If a married woman sees that, this is a sign that she expects a lot of family problems that could disturb her life. And if she sees that her husband is hitting her with wires Which led to the occurrence of an electrical circuit, this is a sign of her separation from her husband. Seeing her carrying an electrical short circuit indicates that she is quick to make decisions and puts herself in incredible situations. It is also evidence of temptation, and those around her are planning her machinations and want to harm her through temptation and slander. We see that electrical short circuit in At home, her husband fell ill with a chronic disease, so she was informed of her husband’s death due to this disease. Interpretation of seeing an electric socket in a dream: An electric shock. Carrying a coin in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many crises in the coming period of his real life. But if he electrocutes himself with an electric socket, the electric shock To himself, it is a warning to him of the need to stop disobeying God. And the need to stop with oneself to correct mistakes and return in repentance to our Lord Almighty. Seeing a damaged plug in the house that causes electrical short circuits to appear, and there was a sick person in the house, so there is news of his approaching death.

title: What is the interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream?

preview.html: In this article we will discuss the interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream. Everyone, regardless of age, wants to eat chocolate because of its delicious taste. It is also used in making many types of sweets. In fact, and in the following lines on the encyclopedia website, we will point out the most important interpretations mentioned by scholars regarding seeing chocolate in a dream. Interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream Symbol of chocolate in a dream Chocolate in a dream is one of the symbols of kindness in the dreamer’s life. And if a person dreams that he is eating chocolate in his dream, This means that there is a lot of food on its way to him, and he will come to him without getting tired. Buying chocolate in a dream means that a new person will enter the dreamer’s life and the relationship between them will become strong. Whoever sees in his dream that he is distributing chocolate, his dream indicates that he will hear good news and the appearance Happy circumstances in his life. Eating chocolate in a man’s dream. Chocolate in a man’s dream symbolizes happiness and joy in his life. Seeing chocolate in an unmarried person’s dream is considered a praiseworthy dream, because it indicates the approaching marriage. If a married man dreams that he is distributing chocolate to children, then His dream indicates that God Almighty will grant him good offspring. Whoever sees in his dream that someone he does not know is distributing chocolate, his dream indicates that he will receive a lot of money. Dreaming of the deceased distributing chocolate means that the dreamer will receive a large allowance, which may be An inheritance. As for the one who sees in his dream that his manager gives him chocolates, this vision is good news for the dreamer about obtaining a promotion. The dream may indicate that the person who gives the chocolates will have love and affection for the major. If a man takes chocolates in a dream from a girl, this means that He will marry that girl. Interpretation of a dream about eating chocolate for a single woman: A well-interpreted vision for an unmarried woman to dream of chocolate, because it means that her engagement or marriage is imminent. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is eating delicious-tasting chocolate, then her dream indicates that God Almighty will give her a good husband who will make her happy. Whoever sees in her dream that someone she knows offers her chocolate, this is a sign of her marriage to this person. Stealing chocolate from an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes a problem for her. Interpretation of eating chocolate in a dream for a married woman. Whoever sees in her dream that she is eating a large amount of chocolate. Chocolate, her dream indicates that she will receive money equal to the amount of chocolate she ate in the dream. A married woman’s dream that someone is giving her chocolate indicates that she will become pregnant soon. But if the person who gave her the chocolate is already dead, then the dream here is good news. To her that she will get a new home. A married woman’s dream of chocolate being stolen from her indicates that there are disagreements between her and her husband that could lead to separation. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman eating chocolate. One of the desirable dreams for a pregnant woman in general is to dream of chocolate, because it heralds goodness for the future.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the sea for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees the sea in her dream and is happy looking at it. This dream indicates that this girl will achieve the dreams she is looking for. And she will live a beautiful life free of all problems and sorrows in the future. When a single girl sees in her dream The sea with the person she loves. This dream indicates that this girl will soon propose to this person who has a good personality. She will live a happy, calm and stable life with him. If an unmarried girl sees the sea in her dream and swam in it and then drowned. This vision shows that this girl is full With problems and worries. And the difficulties that he is trying to face, but he did not succeed in getting rid of these problems easily. When an unmarried girl sees the sea in her dream and looks at it sadly. This vision indicates that this girl will soon hear sad news and live in a state of depression. Whereas if the girl sees the sea In her dream, the sea was also loud and scary. This dream indicates that for this girl, there are people who are trying to keep her away from success. And to prevent her and not want her to succeed, to surpass her and take care of her. If a girl sees the sea while she is sleeping and she cries while looking at him. It indicates This dream indicates that this girl will lose someone dear to her. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the blue sea for single people. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of the sea with her husband. This dream indicates that this woman loves her husband. She is a virtuous woman who takes care of her home. She is in Se loves goodness to people and will bless them with food nearby. When a married woman sees the sea in her dream, but feels sad looking at it. This vision shows that this woman, who is suffering from harsh conditions at home, thinks a lot and is unhappy in her life. If a woman sees A married woman saw the sea in her dream and tried to throw herself into it. This vision indicates that this woman will be exposed to an accident that will lead to her death. But if a married woman sees the sea, its color is beautiful and pure. This vision indicates that this woman will hear the news of her pregnancy soon. If the woman sees A married woman dreams that the sea is floating above her. This vision shows that a calamity will happen to her in her home and will lead to problems and divorce between them. Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a person sees the sea in his dream, he swam and enjoyed it. This dream indicates that this person will travel soon and will not He returns and achieves the achievements he was striving to achieve. When a man sees the sea in his sleep. This dream indicates that this man is optimistic, loves life, generous, and loves helping people. When a man sees the sea in his dream, he is sitting with his wife. This vision indicates that This man will have a beautiful and virtuous child and he will have a prominent position in the future. When a person sees the sea in his dream, the color of the sea is blue. This dream indicates that his wife will give birth to a boy. But if a person sees the sea in his dream, and the color of the sea is pink. This vision indicates However, this man will give birth to a beautiful girl and her health will be
